name: miracle-eye
caption: Miracle Eye

effect.short: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.
effect.full: Resets the target's [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the [field]{mechanic:field}.  A []{type:dark} Pok√©mon under this effect takes normal damage from []{type:psychic} moves.  This move itself ignores [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} and [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} modifiers.

flavorText:
Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by
Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive
target to be hit.
